title: Update
body: Hi, this is a humble request to update Narada to the latest version as the version you are currently using will not be supported for long. Thank you.

data.body: **Happy Diwali!** May this Diwali bring you all the love in the world. Now, forget the markets for some time and celebrate this festival. Go!
data.markdown_body: **Happy Diwali!** May this Diwali bring you all the love in the world. Now, forget the markets for some time and celebrate this festival. Go!
